Subject: Heritrix can't crawle any document
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=183106698

hi,all

I checkout heritrix from cvs and use "maven dist" to build , then
copy the heritrix-0.11.0.zip from distributions dir to another computer.

The computer is a windows 2003 box and I create a .bat file to lauch heritrix 
and it works well. But when I start crawle a new site. It seems heritrix only
download the first page of that site, then the job finished.

On my own computer,it also a windows 2003 os,I use WSAD to build heritrix and run
it in WSAD, it works fine.

The flowing is my start.bat file and anyone can give me some advice? 

---------------------start.bat-------------------------------
set HERITRIX_HOME=E:\heritrix
set JAVA_HOME=C:\j2sdk1.4.2_03

set CLASSPATH=%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\ant-1.5.4.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\commons-cli-1.0.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\commons-collections-2.1.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\commons-httpclient-2.0.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\commons-logging-1.0.3.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\commons-net-1.1.0.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\commons-pool-1.1.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\concurrent-1.3.2.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\dnsjava-1.6.2.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\itext-1.0.0.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\jasper-compiler-tomcat-4.1.30.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\jasper-runtime-tomcat-4.1.30.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\javaswf-CVS-SNAPSHOT-1.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\jetty-4.2.17.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\jmxri-1.2.1.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\jmxtools-1.2.1.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\junit-3.8.1.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\log4j-1.2.8.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\lucene-1.2.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\poi-2.0-RC1-20031102.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\poi-scratchpad-2.0-RC1-20031102.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\servlet-tomcat-4.1.30.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\t.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\heritrix-0.11.0.jar

%JAVA_HOME%\bin\java -Dheritrix.home=%HERITRIX_HOME% org.archive.crawler.Heritrix

-------------------------------------------------------------
